Title: WebNoodles
Description:
A robust Content Management System and Blog Engine developed using Asp.net MVC3,NHibernate,Autofac.
1.Easy to use Blog Engine
2.Custom Theme Engine & View Engine
3.Dependency Injection using Autofac.
4.ORM using NHibernate
5.Multi Blog support
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple Content Management System and Blog Engine Framework developed using Asp.net MVC3,NHibernate,Autofac.

  • A flexible Content Management System and Blog Engine developed using Asp.net MVC3,NHibernate,Autofac.
  • Easy to use Blog Engine
  • Custom Theme Engine & View Engine
  • Dependency Injection using Autofac.
  • ORM using NHibernate
  • Supports Multiple Blog system
  • Embedded SQL Server Database
  • Sample Themes provided
  • Access Admin section using the following URL

www.yoururl.com/admin

Default Login details:

username: hemant

password:hemant

Prerequisites

  • Must have Visual Studio 2010
  • Must activate SQL Express
  • Must support .Net 3.5

Please Note

 WebNoodles is not a complete blog or CMS, its a framework for developers to develop blog or cms .WebNoodles is still in beta. Comment section in admin is unfinished. This is intentional, I want you to do this part yourself , so that you can have a grip over the WebNoodles framework .
